Extract the last test done by a patient only

Extracts the last test only per patient

SurveilLastTest(dataframe, HospNum_Id, Endo_ResultPerformed)

Arguments

dataframe

dataframe
HospNum_Id

Patient ID
Endo_ResultPerformed

Date of the Endoscopy

Examples

SurveilLastTest(Myendo,'HospitalNumber','Dateofprocedure')
#> # A tibble: 100 x 21
